SEARCH
Package com.ac.cst8319.lms.util

Class AuditLogger

java.lang.Object
com.ac.cst8319.lms.util.AuditLogger
public class AuditLogger extends Object
Utility class for audit logging. Logs user actions to the AuditLog table.

  • Method Details

    • log

      public static void log(Long userId, int actionId, String details, String ipAddress)
      Log an audit entry to the database.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user who performed the action
      actionId - the action ID from AuditLogAction table
      details - additional details about the action (JSON or text)
      ipAddress - IP address of the user

    • logUserLogin

      public static void logUserLogin(long userId, String ipAddress)
      Log a user login event.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user who logged in
      ipAddress - IP address

    • logUserLogout

      public static void logUserLogout(long userId, String ipAddress)
      Log a user logout event.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user who logged out
      ipAddress - IP address

    • logLoginFailed

      public static void logLoginFailed(String email, String ipAddress)
      Log a failed login attempt.
      Parameters:
      email - the email used in failed attempt
      ipAddress - IP address

    • logUserRegistration

      public static void logUserRegistration(long userId, String ipAddress)
      Log a new user registration.
      Parameters:
      userId - the newly registered user ID
      ipAddress - IP address

    • logPasswordChange

      public static void logPasswordChange(long userId, String ipAddress)
      Log a password change.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user whose password was changed
      ipAddress - IP address

    • logUserCreated

      public static void logUserCreated(long performedBy, long targetUserId, String details, String ipAddress)
      Log user creation by admin.
      Parameters:
      performedBy - the admin who created the user
      targetUserId - the newly created user ID
      details - additional details
      ipAddress - IP address

    • logUserUpdated

      public static void logUserUpdated(long performedBy, long targetUserId, String details, String ipAddress)
      Log user update by admin.
      Parameters:
      performedBy - the admin who updated the user
      targetUserId - the updated user ID
      details - what was updated
      ipAddress - IP address

    • logUserDeleted

      public static void logUserDeleted(long performedBy, long targetUserId, String ipAddress)
      Log user deletion by admin.
      Parameters:
      performedBy - the admin who deleted the user
      targetUserId - the deleted user ID
      ipAddress - IP address

    • logRoleAssigned

      public static void logRoleAssigned(long performedBy, long targetUserId, int roleId, String roleName, String ipAddress)
      Log role assignment.
      Parameters:
      performedBy - the admin who assigned the role
      targetUserId - the user who received the role
      roleId - the role ID assigned
      roleName - the role name
      ipAddress - IP address

    • logStandingUpdated

      public static void logStandingUpdated(long performedBy, long targetUserId, int standingId, String standingName, String reason, String ipAddress)
      Log account standing update.
      Parameters:
      performedBy - the admin/librarian who updated standing
      targetUserId - the user whose standing was updated
      standingId - the new standing ID
      standingName - the standing name
      reason - reason for the update
      ipAddress - IP address
